relevent_life_history_and_precipitants: Kevin has been experiencing ongoing bullying at school by a peer, leading to a recent altercation and his subsequent suspension. Conflicts at home include tensions over parental rules and physical aggression during a dispute with his mother over a bowl of chocolate. He expresses a sense of entitlement and frustration regarding personal autonomy.
intermediate_beliefs: Everyone should respect my belongings and personal space.
It's important to stand up for myself.
coping_strategies: Reacting to perceived disrespect or aggression with physical actions. Seeking confrontations to assert control or dominance.

behavioral_models.situation: Confrontation with a bully at school.
behavioral_models.automatic_thoughts: He will keep bullying me if I don't stand up for myself.
behavioral_models.meaning_of_at: I need to show strength to stop the harassment.

behavioral_models.situation: Mother tries to impose restrictions at home.
behavioral_models.automatic_thoughts: I'm being treated unfairly and controlled.
behavioral_models.meaning_of_at: I must bend the rules to maintain my independence and autonomy.
behavioral_models.behavior: Defying rules by using hidden phone, wearing forbidden items, etc.

behavioral_models.situation: Arguments over personal property and space.
behavioral_models.automatic_thoughts: My personal belongings and decisions are not being respected.
behavioral_models.meaning_of_at: I feel violated and have to right this wrong.
behavioral_models.behavior: Engaging in physical confrontation with mother over chocolate.
